user.description:
Provide your credentials and the domain used to access your login page via web.

For instance, if you access to `https://connect.elmospa.com/vendor/`, you must set the domain to `vendor`. In case you don't have a vendor defined, set it to `default`.

You can configure the system selecting "Options" after installing the integration.
user.title: Configure your Elmo/IESS system

error.invalid_areas: Digited areas (home or night) are invalid

data.areas_arm_home: Armed areas while at home (e.g 3,4 - optional)
data.areas_arm_vacation: Armed areas when you are on vacation (e.g. 3,4 - optional)

init.description:
Define sectors you want to arm in different modes.

Set 'Scan Interval' value only if you want to reduce data usage, in case the system is connected through a mobile network. Leave it empty for real time updates, or set it to a value in seconds (e.g. 120 for one update every 2 minutes)
init.title: Configure your Elmo/IESS system
